description: This file defines the NeonFunTheme class which provides theming styles (colors, fonts, decorations) for a Flutter application, including a light theme, header gradient, and neon glow effects.

classes.name: NeonFunTheme
classes.description: Provides static methods for generating themes and styles for a Flutter application following a specific style guide.

methods.name: light
methods.description: Returns a ThemeData object configured with a custom color scheme, fonts, appBar, card, buttons, and other UI elements matching the Neon Fun style guide.

methods.name: playfulHeaderGradient
methods.description: Generates a linear gradient for headers with a playful neon style, using theme-based colors with transparency.

methods.name: neonGlow
methods.description: Creates a list of BoxShadow objects representing a soft neon glow with specified color and optional blur radius.
